#id=1
#text=As a child , I loved taking baths .
#id=2
#text=My mother always had to fill the tub for me so that the water would not be too hot or too cold .
#id=3
#text=I 'd say that the ideal temperature for the water was about 90 degrees .
#id=4
#text=My favorite part of taking a bath was the bubbles .
#id=5
#text=I loved to splash around the tub and play with the bubbles .
#id=6
#text=Once I sat in the tub , I used shampoo to wash my hair and a washed my body with a soapy washcloth .
#id=7
#text=I made sure to wash behind my ears and on my face as well .
#id=8
#text=Once I was clean , I would play with my bath toys for a little while .
#id=9
#text=After some time has passed , I drained the water .
#text=After draining the water , I would stand up and dry myself off with a towel .
#text=I enjoyed taking baths because I often needed to be cleaned , I loved to play outside as a kid .
